pkgmetadata.longdescription: core_module_status_registry_app===============================Status registry moduleQuick start===========1. Add "core_module_status_registry_app" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting-----------------------------------------------------------------------.. code:: python INSTALLED_APPS = [ ... 'core_module_status_registry_app', ]2. Include the core_module_status_registry_app URLconf in your project urls.py------------------------------------------------------------------------------.. code:: python url(r'^', include('core_module_status_registry_app.urls')),
